price: 119 Nous l’avons donc sauvé, ainsi que ses compagnons, dans l’Arche chargée d’hommes et d’animaux,
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
